dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Hello, I'm on a quest to save the kingdom from the dark sorcerer.

dialogues.speaker: Dark Sorcerer
dialogues.text: Foolish mortal, you think you can defeat me? My powers are too great for you!

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I've heard of your powers, but I'm not afraid. I have a special sword that will protect me.

dialogues.speaker: Dark Sorcerer
dialogues.text: A sword? Ha! It's no match for my dark magic.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: We'll see about that. Let's end this!
